name: SnapCalorie
headline: Single photo nutrition tracking.
description: SnapCalorie is the world’s first app where you can take a photo of ANY meal and get an accurate calorie count.  It takes seconds to use and is more accurate than a trained nutritionist. The team previously co-founded Google Lens, Cloud Vision API, and published a CVPR paper demonstrating the first algorithm to outperform a professional nutritionist at calorie counting.

founders.name: Wade Norris, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-Google AI, ex-Google [X]. Computer vision researcher.

Co-lead for the 100+ researcher Mobile Vision team at Google AI. During my time, the team co-founded Google Cloud Vision API, Google Lens, MobileNets, and a wide variety of computer vision models powering products across Google.

Co-founded The Spaghetti Detective, now the #1 paid plugin in 3D printing.

Co-author for CVPR accepted Nutrition5k paper. First algorithm to outperform a professional nutritionist at visual calorie counting.

founders.name: Scott Baron, Founder
founders.description: Scott Baron, the co-founder and CTO of SnapCalorie. He previously spent 12 years as a systems engineer in Aerospace where he developed software and algorithms to support high reliability missions and advanced data science applications.

generated_description:
### SnapCalorie: Revolutionizing Nutrition Tracking

SnapCalorie is a cutting-edge app that simplifies the often laborious task of tracking meal nutrition with just one snap. Founded in 2021 and hustled through Y Combinator's Batch S21, this New York-based company is here to change how we approach calorie counting.  

#### What Do They Do?
Imagine being able to take a picture of any meal and instantly receive an accurate calorie count and nutritional breakdown. That’s exactly what SnapCalorie offers. Leveraging advanced AI and computer vision technology—developed by a team that once worked on Google Lens and the Cloud Vision API—this app delivers precision that outshines even seasoned nutritionists. It all happens in mere seconds.  

#### Key Features
1. **Fast & Accurate**: Snap a photo of your meal, and within moments, the app provides a detailed calorie count—five times faster than traditional methods and twice as accurate as a nutritionist.
2. **User-Friendly**: Forget tedious entries; just snap and go. The app is designed for quick logging, allowing you to enjoy meals without always being glued to your screen.
3. **Voice Notes**: For those moments at home, SnapCalorie supports voice notes. You can easily log your nutrition hands-free, speaking either detailed amounts or just a summary.

#### Achievements & Impact
- **100,000+ happy users** are already aboard, showing a genuine interest in streamlining their nutrition tracking.
- The app is not just a novelty; it’s a practical solution for anyone serious about their health and well-being.

Looking forward, SnapCalorie continues to refine its technology and expand its user base, making nutrition tracking as effortless as pointing a camera. Whether you’re at a bustling restaurant or cooking at home, SnapCalorie aims to be your go-to companion for healthy eating.

For those interested, check out their website: [SnapCalorie](https://www.snapcalorie.com/) to get started on the fastest way to track your meals!
